document_data.name: House of Light
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Light''' was the guildhall of a [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters]].
document_data.Location: The House of Light was located along [[Scroll Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]]. Behind the guildhall stood [[House of Light Storage|a warehouse]] used by the guild.
document_data.Structure: This guildhall was three-stories tall. The building was a row house that was near constantly bright. Out front of it stood a {{SI|4|ft|long=yes}} tall [[candle]] that would be lit at night — this was one of the brightest spots in the Trades Ward at such hours and it was easily found by the [[lemon]] scent its wax gave off.
document_data.Services: During the day, members of the Guild of Chandlers and Lamplighters crafted candles, mostly from tallow, that they would sell. They also worked on repairing [[lamp]]s during daylight hours.
document_data.Reputation: The House of Light was among some of the more notable and recognizable guildhalls in the Trades Ward.
